Madhya Pradesh.intro: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has given a Notification for the recruitment Medical Officer Vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.
Madhya Pradesh.contentHtml:
Name of the Post: MPPSC Medical Officer 2024 Online Form

Post Date: 10-08-2024

Latest Update : 04-09-2024

Total Vacancy: 895

Brief Information: Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC) has given a Notification for the recruitment Medical Officer Vacancy. Those Candidates who are interested in the vacancy details & completed all eligibility criteria can read the Notification & Apply Online.

Madhya Pradesh Public Service Commission (MPPSC)

Advt No. 09/2024

Medical Officer Vacancy 2024

WWW.FREEJOBALERT.COM

Download Mobile App

Application Fee

  • For All Others & candidates resident outside of MP State: Rs. 500/-
  • For SC, ST, OBC (non-creamy layer), EWS & PwD Candidates of MP State: Rs. 250/-
  • Portal Fee: Rs. 40/-
  • Payment mode: Through Online
  • For More Details regarding fee refer the notification

Important Dates

  • Date of Notification: 08-08-2024
  • Starting Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 30-08-2024 (12:00 Noon)
  • Last Date to Apply Online & Payment of Fee: 29-09-2024 (12:00 Noon)
  • Last Date for Receipt of Hard Copy: 04-10-2024
  • Dates for Error Corrections in Applications (Rs.50/-): 03-09-2024 to 01-10-2024 (12:00 Noon)

Age Limit (as on 01-01-2025)

  • Minimum Age Limit: 21 Years
  • Maximum Age Limit: 40 Years
  • Age Relaxation Applicable as per Rules.

Educational Qualification

  • Candidates should posses M.B.B.S.
